mapper.insert: insert into goodsSystem.goods(goods_Name, shop_Id, goods_Suggest, goods_ImageUrl, goods_Money, create_Time, update_Time) VALUES (#{goodsName},#{shopId},#{goodsSuggest},#{goodsImageUrl},#{goodsMoney},#{createTime},#{updateTime});
mapper.select: select id, goods_Name, shop_Id, goods_Suggest, goods_ImageUrl, goods_Money, create_Time, update_Time from goodsSystem.goods where id=#{id};
select id, goods_Name, shop_Id, goods_Suggest, goods_ImageUrl, goods_Money, create_Time, update_Time from goodsSystem.goods where goods_Name=#{goodsName};
select id, goods_Name, shop_Id, goods_Suggest, goods_ImageUrl, goods_Money, create_Time, update_Time from goodsSystem.goods where shop_Id=#{shopId};
select id, goods_Name, shop_Id, goods_Suggest, goods_ImageUrl, goods_Money, create_Time, update_Time from goodsSystem.goods where shop_Id=#{shopId} limit #{start},#{qty};
